verses.verse: O Jehovah <WH3068>, thou God <WH410> to whom vengeance <WH5360> belongeth <WH410>, Thou God to whom vengeance <WH5360> belongeth <WH3313>, shine forth.
Lift up <WH5375> thyself <WH8199>, thou judge of the earth <WH776>: Render <WH7725> to the proud <WH1343> their desert <WH1576>.
Jehovah <WH3068>, how long shall the wicked <WH7563>, How long shall the wicked <WH7563> triumph <WH5937>?
They prate <WH5042>, they speak <WH5042> arrogantly <WH6277>: All the workers <WH6466> of iniquity <WH205> boast themselves <WH559>.
They break in pieces <WH1792> thy people <WH5971>, O Jehovah <WH3068>, And afflict <WH6031> thy heritage <WH5159>.
They slay <WH2026> the widow <WH490> and the sojourner <WH1616>, And murder <WH7523> the fatherless <WH3490>.
And they say <WH559>, Jehovah <WH3050> will not see <WH7200>, Neither will the God <WH430> of Jacob <WH3290> consider <WH995>.
Consider <WH995>, ye brutish <WH1197> among the people <WH5971>; And ye fools <WH3684>, when will ye be wise <WH7919>?
He that planted <WH5193> the ear <WH241>, shall he not hear <WH8085>? He that formed <WH3335> the eye <WH5869>, shall he not see <WH5027>?
He that chastiseth <WH3256> the nations <WH1471>, shall not he correct <WH3198>, Even he that teacheth <WH3925> man <WH120> knowledge <WH1847>?
Jehovah <WH3068> knoweth <WH3045> the thoughts <WH4284> of man <WH120>, That they are vanity <WH1892>.
Blessed <WH835> is the man <WH1397> whom thou chastenest <WH3256>, O Jehovah <WH3050>, And teachest <WH3925> out of thy law <WH8451>;
That thou mayest give him rest <WH8252> from the days <WH3117> of adversity <WH7451>, Until the pit <WH7845> be digged <WH3738> for the wicked <WH7563>.
For Jehovah <WH3068> will not cast off <WH5203> his people <WH5971>, Neither will he forsake <WH5800> his inheritance <WH5159>.
For judgment <WH4941> shall return <WH7725> unto righteousness <WH6664>; And all the upright <WH3477> in heart <WH3820> shall follow it <WH310>.
Who will rise up <WH6965> for me against the evil-doers <WH7489>? Who will stand up <WH3320> for me against the workers <WH6466> of iniquity <WH205>?
Unless <WH3884> Jehovah <WH3068> had been my help <WH5833>, My soul <WH5315> had soon <WH4592> dwelt <WH7931> in silence <WH1745>.
When I said <WH559>, My foot <WH7272> slippeth <WH4131>; Thy lovingkindness <WH2617>, O Jehovah <WH3068>, held me up <WH5582>.
In the multitude <WH7230> of my thoughts <WH8312> within <WH7130> me Thy comforts <WH8575> delight <WH8173> my soul <WH5315>.
Shall the throne <WH3678> of wickedness <WH1942> have fellowship <WH2266> with thee <WH3335>, Which frameth mischief <WH5999> by statute <WH2706>?
They gather themselves together <WH1413> against the soul <WH5315> of the righteous <WH6662>, And condemn <WH7561> the innocent <WH5355> blood <WH1818>.
But Jehovah <WH3068> hath been my high tower <WH4869>, And my God <WH430> the rock <WH6697> of my refuge <WH4268>.
And he hath brought <WH7725> upon them their own iniquity <WH205>, And will cut them off <WH6789> in their own wickedness <WH7451>; Jehovah <WH3068> our God <WH430> will cut them off <WH6789>.
